31 #include <string>

33 // Class storing the current gas state in pressure, temperature and velocity.
34 class State
35 {
36 public:
37  explicit State(const double& p, const double& u, const double& T) :
38  m_P(p), m_V(u), m_T(T) {}
39  State (const State&) = delete;
40  State (State&&) = default;
41  State& operator=( const State &) = delete;
42 
43  double getP() const { return m_P; }
44  double getV() const { return m_V; }
45  double getT() const { return m_T; }
46 
47 private:
48  const double m_P;
49  const double m_V;
50  const double m_T;
51 };
52 
53 // This class computes the 1T Rankine-Hugoniot relations.
54 // It will be abstracted to treat additional state models.
55 class RankineHugoniot
56 {
57 public:
58  explicit RankineHugoniot(Mutation::Mixture& mix) : m_mix(mix) {}
59 
60  State computeRH(const State& pre_shock) noexcept
61  {
62  const double P_pre = pre_shock.getP();
63  const double V_pre = pre_shock.getV();
64  const double T_pre = pre_shock.getT();
65 
66  m_mix.setState(&P_pre, &T_pre, set_state_PT);
67 
68  // Thermodynamic state based on the pre-shock conditions
69  const double gamma = m_mix.mixtureEquilibriumGamma();
70  const double gp1 = gamma + 1.;
71  const double gm1 = gamma - 1.;
72  const double a_speed = m_mix.equilibriumSoundSpeed();
73  const double Ms = V_pre/a_speed;
74  const double Ms2 = Ms*Ms;
75 
76  // Rankine-Hugoniot relations
77  const double P_post = P_pre*(1. + 2.*gamma/gp1*(Ms2 - 1.));
78  const double V_post = V_pre - a_speed*(2./gp1*(Ms - 1./Ms));
79  const double T_post = T_pre*(1. + (2.*gm1/(gp1*gp1)*((gamma*Ms2 + 1.)/Ms2)*(Ms2 - 1.)));
80 
81  return std::move(State(P_post, V_post, T_post));
82  }
83 
84  double postShockP() const { return m_P_post; }
85  double postShockV() const { return m_V_post; }
86  double postShockT() const { return m_T_post; }
87 
88 private:
89  Mutation::Mixture& m_mix;
90  const int set_state_PT = 1;
91 
92  double m_P_post = 1.;
93  double m_V_post = 1.;
94  double m_T_post = 1.;
95 };
96 
97 enum EquilibriumMethod { bisection = 0, newton = 1 };
98 
99 // Class responsible for parsing and storing the input options.
100 class ShockOptions {
101 public:
102  explicit ShockOptions(const std::vector<std::string>& args)
103  {
104  if ( args.size() < n_args_min ) printHelpMessage();
105 
106  // Printing help
107  if (std::find(args.begin(), args.end(), "-h") != args.end()) printHelpMessage();
108  if (std::find(args.begin(), args.end(), "--help") != args.end()) printHelpMessage();
109 
110  // Parsing options
111  const auto p_begin = args.begin();
112  const auto p_end = args.end();
113 
114  const auto opts_p = find(p_begin, p_end, "-P");
115  if (opts_p != p_end && opts_p+1 != p_end)
116  try { m_P_pre = stod(args[opts_p-p_begin+1]);
117  } catch(std::exception& error) {
118  std::cerr << "Error in option -P. The input value is not a double!\n";
119  }
120 
121  const auto opts_V = find(p_begin, p_end, "-V");
122  if (opts_V != p_end && opts_V+1 != p_end)
123  try { m_V_pre = stod(args[opts_V-p_begin+1]);
124  } catch(std::exception& error) {
125  std::cerr << "Error in option -V. The input value is not a double!\n";
126  }
127 
128  const auto opts_T = find(args.begin(), args.end(), "-T");
129  if (opts_T != p_end && opts_T+1 != p_end)
130  try { m_T_pre = stod(args[opts_T-p_begin+1]);
131  } catch(std::exception& error) {
132  std::cerr << "Error in option -T. The input value is not a double!\n";
133  }
134 
135  const auto opts_m = find(args.begin(), args.end(), "-m");
136  if (opts_m != p_end && opts_m+1 != p_end)
137  try { m_equil_method = stoi(args[opts_m-p_begin+1]);
138  } catch(std::exception& error) {
139  std::cerr << "Error in option -m. The input value is not an int!\n";
140  }
141 
142  if (m_equil_method > 1) {
143  std::cerr << "Unknown option " << m_equil_method
144  << " for equilibrium method.\n";
145  printHelpMessage();
146  }
147 
148  // Parsing mixture
149  m_mix_name = args.back();
150  }
151 
152  double preShockP() const { return m_P_pre; }
153  double preShockV() const { return m_V_pre; }
154  double preShockT() const { return m_T_pre; }
155  const std::string& mixtureName() const { return m_mix_name; }
156  int postShockEquilMethod() const { return m_equil_method; }
157 
158 private:
159  void printHelpMessage() {
160  std::cout << "Computes the Rankine-Hugoniot and post-shock equilibrium \n"
161  << "given the pre-shock state for a give mixture.\n";
162  std::cout << "Usage: mppshock [OPTIONS] mixture\n";
163  std::cout << tab << "-h, --help prints this help message\n";
164  std::cout << tab << "-P Free stream pressure range in Pa (default: 1 atm)\n";
165  std::cout << tab << "-T Free stream temperature range in K (default: 300 K)\n";
166  std::cout << tab << "-V Free stream velocity range in m/s (default: 10000 m/s)\n";
167  std::cout << tab << "-m Solution algorithm; 0: Bisection - 1: Newton-Raphson (default)\n";
168  std::cout << "Example: mppshock -P 1000 -V 10000 -T 300 -m 0 air_5\n";
169  exit(0);
170  }
171 
172 private:
173  double m_P_pre = Mutation::ONEATM;
174  double m_V_pre = 10000.;
175  double m_T_pre = 300.;
176  int m_equil_method = newton;
177 
178  std::string m_mix_name;
179 
180  const std::string tab = " ";
181  const size_t n_args_min = 2;
182 };
183 
184 // Abstract class responsible for the computation of the post shock equilibrium.
185 // The solid classes implement different algorithms for the equilibrium calculation.
186 class PostShockEquilibrium {
187 public:
188  // Virtual destructor
189  virtual ~PostShockEquilibrium() = default;
190 
191  // This function is the core of the class. It takes as input the pre-shock state
192  // and returns the relaxed equilibrated post-shock state.
193  virtual State computePostShockEquilibrium(const State& pre_shock) = 0;
194 };
195 
196 // Computes the post shock equilibrium based on a bisection algorithm. This
197 // method should be used only for validation and in stiff cases where the Newton
198 // solver fails to converge.
199 class PostShockEquilibriumBisection : public PostShockEquilibrium {
200 public:
201  explicit PostShockEquilibriumBisection(Mutation::Mixture& mix) : m_mix(mix) {}
202 
203  State computePostShockEquilibrium(const State& pre_shock)
204  {
205  const double p_pre = pre_shock.getP();
206  const double u_pre = pre_shock.getV();
207  const double T_pre = pre_shock.getT();
208 
209  m_mix.setState(&p_pre, &T_pre, set_state_PT);
210  const double rho_pre = m_mix.density();
211  const double h_pre = m_mix.mixtureHMass();
212  const double mdot = rho_pre*u_pre;
213 
214  // Setting up solver
215  double r = 0.1; // Initial density ratio
216  double p_eq, T_eq;
217 
218  // Solving LTE based on bisection method
219  double err_r = 1.;
220  while (err_r > m_tol) {
221  p_eq = p_pre + mdot*u_pre*(1. - r);
222  double h_eq = h_pre + 0.5*u_pre*u_pre*(1 - r*r);
223 
224  double Tl = T_pre;
225  double Tu = m_T_high;
226 
227  T_eq = 0.5*(Tl + Tu);
228 
229  double err_T = 1.;
230  while (err_T > m_tol) {
231  // Lower
232  m_mix.setState(&p_eq, &Tl, set_state_PT);
233  const double fl = -h_eq + m_mix.mixtureHMass();
234 
235  // Upper
236  m_mix.setState(&p_eq, &Tu, set_state_PT);
237  const double fu = -h_eq + m_mix.mixtureHMass();
238 
239  // Solution
240  m_mix.setState(&p_eq, &T_eq, set_state_PT);
241  const double f = -h_eq + m_mix.mixtureHMass();
242 
243  double T_ref = T_eq;
244  if ((f*fu) < 0.){
245  Tl = T_eq;
246  T_eq = .5*(Tl + Tu);
247  } else if ((f*fl) < 0.) {
248  Tu = T_eq;
249  T_eq = .5*(Tl + Tu);
250  }
251  err_T = abs(T_eq-T_ref)/T_ref;
252  }
253 
254  // Density update
255  const double rho_eq = m_mix.density();
256 
257  double r_old = r;
258  r = rho_pre / rho_eq;
259  err_r = abs(r - r_old)/r_old;
260  }
261 
262  m_mix.setState(&p_eq, &T_eq, set_state_PT);
263  p_eq = p_pre + mdot*u_pre*(1. - r);
264  const double rho_eq = m_mix.density();
265  const double u_eq = mdot / rho_eq;
266 
267  return State(p_eq, u_eq, T_eq);
268  }
269 
270 private:
271  Mutation::Mixture& m_mix;
272 
273  const int set_state_PT = 1;
274  const double m_tol = 1.e-12;
275  const double m_T_high = 100000.;
276 };
277 
278 // Computing the post shock equilibrium based on a Newton-Raphson loop. Even
279 // though this methodology is less robust, it is very efficient.
280 class PostShockEquilibriumNewton : public PostShockEquilibrium {
281 public:
282  explicit PostShockEquilibriumNewton(Mutation::Mixture& mix) : m_mix(mix) {}
283 
284  State computePostShockEquilibrium(const State& pre_shock)
285  {
286  const double p_pre = pre_shock.getP();
287  const double u_pre = pre_shock.getV();
288  const double T_pre = pre_shock.getT();
289 
290  m_mix.setState(&p_pre, &T_pre, set_state_PT);
291  const double rho_pre = m_mix.density();
292  const double h_pre = m_mix.mixtureHMass();
293 
294  // Conserved quanities
295  const double mdot = rho_pre*u_pre;
296  const double momentum = mdot*u_pre+p_pre;
297  const double E = h_pre + .5*u_pre*u_pre;
298 
299  // Initial Guess
300  double ratio = .99;
301  double T_eq = T_pre;
302  double p_eq = p_pre;
303  double u_eq = u_pre;
304 
305  // Outer loop for Mass/Momentum
306  double dR = 1.;
307  while (dR > m_tol) {
308  p_eq = p_pre + mdot*u_pre*(1.-ratio);
309  double rho_eq = rho_pre/ratio;
310  double RHS = h_pre + .5*u_pre*u_pre*(1. - ratio*ratio);
311 
312  // Inner loop for Energy
313  double dT = 1.;
314  while (abs(dT) > m_tol) {
315  m_mix.setState(&p_eq, &T_eq, set_state_PT);
316 
317  const double h_eq = m_mix.mixtureHMass();
318  const double cp_eq = m_mix.mixtureFrozenCpMass();
319 
320  dT = (h_eq-RHS)/cp_eq;
321  T_eq = T_eq - dT;
322  }
323 
324  m_mix.setState(&p_eq, &T_eq, set_state_PT);
325  rho_eq = m_mix.density();
326 
327  // Density ratio update and residual
328  const double old_ratio = ratio;
329  ratio = rho_pre/rho_eq;
330  dR = abs(ratio - old_ratio)/ratio;
331  }
332  u_eq = u_pre*ratio;
333 
334  return std::move(State(p_eq, u_eq, T_eq));
335  }
336 
337 private:
338  Mutation::Mixture& m_mix;
339 
340  const int set_state_PT = 1;
341  const double m_tol = 1.e-10;
342 };
343 
344 // Helper class that prints
345 class PrintResults {
346 public:
347  explicit PrintResults(
348  const State& free_stream,
349  const State& RH,
350  const State& equil) :
351  m_fs(free_stream), m_RH(RH), m_eq(equil) {}
352 
353  void output() noexcept {
354  std::cout.precision(m_precision);
355 
356  std::cout << std::endl;
357  std::cout
358  << tab << std::setw(width) << " "
359  << std::setw(width) << "Pressure (Pa)"
360  << std::setw(width) << "Velocity (m/s)"
361  << std::setw(width) << "Temperature (K)" << std::endl;;
362  std::cout
363  << tab << std::setw(width) << std::left
364  << "Free Stream:" << std::fixed
365  << std::setw(width) << std::right << m_fs.getP()
366  << std::setw(width) << std::right << m_fs.getV()
367  << std::setw(width) << std::right << m_fs.getT() << std::endl;
368  std::cout
369  << tab << std::setw(width) << std::left
370  << "Rankine-Hugoniot:" << std::fixed
371  << std::setw(width) << std::right << m_RH.getP()
372  << std::setw(width) << std::right << m_RH.getV()
373  << std::setw(width) << std::right << m_RH.getT() << std::endl;
374  std::cout
375  << tab << std::setw(width) << std::left
376  << "Equilibrated:" << std::fixed
377  << std::setw(width) << std::right << m_eq.getP()
378  << std::setw(width) << std::right << m_eq.getV()
379  << std::setw(width) << std::right << m_eq.getT() << std::endl;
380  std::cout << std::endl;
381  }
382 
383 private:
384  const State& m_fs;
385  const State& m_RH;
386  const State& m_eq;
387 
388  const int m_precision = 1;
389  const std::string tab = " ";
390  const int width = 20;
391 };
392 
408 int main(int argc, char** argv)
409 {
410  std::vector<std::string> args(argv, argv + argc);
411  ShockOptions mppshock_opts(args);
412 
413  Mutation::MixtureOptions mix_opts(mppshock_opts.mixtureName());
414 
415  const std::string state_model = "Equil";
416  mix_opts.setStateModel(state_model);
417  Mutation::Mixture mix(mix_opts);
418 
419  State pre_shock(
420  mppshock_opts.preShockP(),
421  mppshock_opts.preShockV(),
422  mppshock_opts.preShockT());
423 
424  RankineHugoniot rh(mix);
425  State post_shock_RH = rh.computeRH(pre_shock);
426 
427  const int method = mppshock_opts.postShockEquilMethod();
428  std::unique_ptr<PostShockEquilibrium> p_method = nullptr;
429  if (method == bisection) {
430  p_method = std::unique_ptr<PostShockEquilibrium> {
431  new PostShockEquilibriumBisection(mix) };
432  } else if (method == newton) {
433  p_method = std::unique_ptr<PostShockEquilibrium> {
434  new PostShockEquilibriumNewton(mix) };
435  }
436 
437  State post_shock_equil = p_method->computePostShockEquilibrium(pre_shock);
438 
439  PrintResults print_results(pre_shock, post_shock_RH, post_shock_equil);
440  print_results.output();
441 
442  return 0;
443 }
